alert.note: Alert for Carbon (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 03 at 5:30PM MDT until July 03 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL CARBON COUNTY... At 530 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Muddy Gap to near Separation Lake to 12 miles southwest of Teton Reservoir, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rawlins, Sinclair, Seminoe Campground, Seminoe Dam, Separation Lake, Muddy Gap and Teton Reservoir. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 200 and 242. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Cheyenne.
